flawed_nl_solution:
He wants to stay 1000*0.2=<<1000*0.2=20>>20 pounds under the max
So he wants to stay under 1000-20=<<1000-20=980>>980 pounds
That means he can put 980-250=<<980-250=730>>730 pounds on the bar
#### 730

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 20. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
